00037 #ifndef _LBFGS_H
00038 #define _LBFGS_H
00039 
00040 #include "lbfgs_algo.h"
00041 
00042 #if defined(__cplusplus)
00043 extern "C" {
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 typedef struct {
00047     int     n;
00048     int     m;
00049     int     niter;       /* number of iterations so far                        */
00050     int     nfuns;       /* number of function evaluations so far              */
00051     int     iflag;
00052     int     diagco;
00053     int     iprint[2];   /* see the comment in lbfgs.f for usage of this field */
00054     double  eps;
00055     double  xtol;
00056     double *diag;
00057     double *w;
00058 } lbfgs_t;
00059 
00060 lbfgs_t* lbfgs_create(int n, int m, double eps);
00061 int lbfgs_run(lbfgs_t* obj, double* x, double* f, double* g);
00062 void lbfgs_destory(lbfgs_t* obj);
00063 
00064 #if defined(__cplusplus)
00065 }
00066 #endif
00067 
00068 #endif /* ifndef _LBFGS_H */
